title: Mooguese: The Forgotten Language of Cows

data.title: Mooguese: The Forgotten Language of Cows
data.solution:
-- global pointer
local pointer = 0

---@param mooWord string
function getchar(mooWord)
    if mooWord == "_" then
        pointer = 0
        return " "
    end

    local multiplier = 1
    local value = 0
    for letter in mooWord:gmatch("%S") do
        if letter == "m" then multiplier = -1
        elseif letter == "O" then value = value + 4
        elseif letter == "o" then value = value + 1
        elseif letter == "_" then value = 0
        end
    end
    -- "rotate" the pointer
    pointer = pointer + value * multiplier
    -- return letter from the alphabet (97-123)
    return string.char(97 + pointer)
end

local sentence = io.read()
for word in sentence:gmatch("%S+") do
    io.write(getchar(word))
end
data.statement:
`
Look! I discovered an old book written in 
Mooguese, the forgotten language of cows! 
Let's translate it into English.
        \    ^__^
          \  (oo)\_______
             (__)\       )\/\
                 ||----w |
                 ||     ||
`
I will send you Mooguese words separated by spaces.
You will need a pointer to select letters of the alphabet: `a = 0, b = 1, …, z = 25`
The pointer must start at <<0>>.
Don't worry, the pointer will never go outside the 0–25 range.

Each word is either:
- A “moo-word”
- The symbol {{_}}, which means: output a <<space>> and reset pointer to <<0>>

When checking "moo-words":
1. Count its {{O}} and {{o}}: 
    - {{O}} = 4 points
    - {{o}} = 1 point
    - (Sum = moo value)
2. Check the first letter:
    - {{M}} → <<add>> the moo value to the pointer
    - {{m}} → <<subtract>> the moo value
3. Output the letter corresponding to the new pointer value.

The final output contains only lowercase letters and spaces.

Example:
`
M o       M O O O o    m O O O o       _
| |       | | | | |    | | | | |       |
| v       | v v v v    | v v v v       |
| 1       | 4+4+4+1=13 | 4+4+4+1=13    |
|~>Add 1  |~> Add 13   |~> Subtract 13 |~> Set 0
pointer=1 pointer=14   pointer=1       pointer=0
    b         o            b            *space*
would result in "bob "
`
